Acclaimed actresses Francesca Annis and Samantha Bond lead an impressive ensemble cast in a new six-part drama for ITV. Home Fires follows a group of inspirational women in a rural Cheshire community where the shadow of World War II is casting a dark cloud over their lives.
January 7, 2025 - Introducing updates to our Ring portfolio, new Panasonic smart TVs with Fire TV built in, LLM-powered capabilities in select BMW vehicles, and more.

March 2, 2025 - Home Fires is a British period television drama about the life of Women's Institute members on the Home Front during the Second World War. Set in a rural Cheshire community called Great Paxford, the series is produced by ITV, and launched its first series in May 2015.

t: Home Fires on MASTERPIECE on PBS
s: Samantha Bond (Downton Abbey) and Francesca Annis (Reckless) star in this story of inspiring women during WWII. #HomeFiresPBS
